name: todo-it
description: A simple and useful todo list application.

scripts.build-debug-css: cd src && node-sass app/app.scss --output-style compressed app.min.css
scripts.watch-debug-css: cd src && nodemon -e scss -x "npm run build-debug-css"
scripts.build-debug-js: cd src && uglifyjs app/todo-it.js app/navbar/directive.js app/navbar/navbar-items/text-directive.js app/todo/controller.js app/todo/directive.js app/todo/todo-item/directive.js app/todo/todo-progress/directive.js -c -m --source-map root='http://localhost:3000',url=app.min.js.map -o app.min.js
scripts.watch-debug-js: cd src && nodemon --ignore *.min.js -e js -x "npm run build-debug-js"
scripts.build-debug: npm run build-debug-css && npm run build-debug-js
scripts.debug-server: npm run build-debug && concurrently --kill-others "http-server src -p 3000" "npm run watch-debug-css" "npm run watch-debug-js"
scripts.watch-prod-css: cd src && nodemon -e scss -x "npm run build-prod-css"
scripts.build-prod-js: cd src && uglifyjs app/todo-it.js app/navbar/directive.js app/navbar/navbar-items/text-directive.js app/todo/controller.js app/todo/directive.js app/todo/todo-item/directive.js app/todo/todo-progress/directive.js -c -m -o ../dist/app.min.js
scripts.watch-prod-js: cd src && nodemon -e js -x "npm run build-prod-js"
scripts.copy-prod-files: cd src && copyfiles **/*.html ../dist && copyfiles lib/**/* ../dist  && copyfiles fonts/**/* ../dist
scripts.build-prod: npm run build-prod-css && npm run build-prod-js && npm run copy-prod-files
scripts.prod-server: npm run build-prod && concurrently --kill-others "http-server dist -p 3001" "npm run watch-prod-css" "npm run watch-prod-js"

author: Sean Cogan
